[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/webgl-msdf](./webgl-msdf.md) &gt; [convertGlyphs](./webgl-msdf.convertglyphs.md)

## convertGlyphs variable

Takes a JSON spec produced by the MSDF font generator at [https://github.com/donmccurdy/msdf-bmfont-web](https://github.com/donmccurdy/msdf-bmfont-web) and transforms it into a filtered, more compact glyph spec used by the functions of this module.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
convertGlyphs: (raw: RawGlyphs) => MSDFFont
```
